Description.Text: Stop at Saffron House Guest House to discover the wonders of Cape Town. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Casino, 24-hour room service, room service, airport transfer, meeting facilities are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find heating, desk, balcony/terrace, fan, television. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, spa. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Cape Town, Saffron House Guest House will make you feel instantly at home.
